'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|He peers at you through half-moon spectacles. His face is hidden behind a thick but well-groomed beard, and his eyes constantly dart between you and the doorway.}}
Ernezzo is a Vailian with a talent for 'acquisition' and 'distribution' - a smuggler and a black market specialist, in other words. He has plenty of connections across the world, including a svef supply line reaching as far as Defiance Bay.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = Weapons, armor, ingredients. Also sells the unique items [Garari Cuirass](/garariCuirass/) and [The Red Hand](/theRedHand/). Completing [The Cornett's Call](/theCornettsCall/) will grant you a 10% discount in his store.
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [Harsh Medicine](/harshMedicine/)

[Trade Secrets](/tradeSecrets/)
|none            = 
|other           = * Killing Ernezzo (or having him killed during [Harsh Medicine](/harshMedicine/)) will give you a 10% discount at [Spindle Man's Store](/theSpindleMan/).
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Harsh Medicine](/harshMedicine/): He can provide the medicine - for a price.
